Package stocks.controller

Interface Features

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortfolioGUIController
    public interface Features
    This interface represents features to be implemented for GUI actions.

    • Method Detail

      • createPortfolio

        void createPortfolio​(java.lang.String pName,
                     java.lang.String pType)
        creates the portfolio with given name and type.
        Parameters:
        pName - the name of portfolio.
        pType - the type of portfolio to be created.

      • buyStock

        void buyStock​(java.lang.String ticker,
              java.lang.String date,
              java.lang.String qty,
              java.lang.String comm,
              java.lang.String pName)
        buys the stocks in a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the company name.
        date - the date on which stocks should be bought.
        qty - the quantity of stocks to be bought.
        comm - the commission to be paid for this transaction.
        pName - the name of portfolio to be created.

      • investFixedAmountStrategy

        void investFixedAmountStrategy​(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> stockAndPercent,
                               double investmentAmount,
                               double commissionFee,
                               java.lang.String date)
        method to invest in fixed amount strategy.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the company name.
        stockAndPercent - the map which contains stock names and respective percentages.
        investmentAmount - the amount to be invested using this strategy.
        commissionFee - the commission to be paid for this transaction.
        date - the name of portfolio to be created.

      • dollarCostStrategy

        void dollarCostStrategy​(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> stockAndPercent,
                        double investmentAmount,
                        double commissionFee,
                        int investmentInterval,
                        java.lang.String dateStart,
                        java.lang.String dateEnd)
        method to invest in dollar cost strategy.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the company name.
        stockAndPercent - the map which contains stock names and respective percentages.
        investmentAmount - the amount to be invested using this strategy.
        commissionFee - the commission to be paid for this transaction.
        dateStart - the start date of investment.
        dateEnd - the end date of investment.

      • sellStock

        void sellStock​(java.lang.String ticker,
               java.lang.String date,
               java.lang.String qty,
               java.lang.String comm,
               java.lang.String pName)
        method to sellStocks in a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the company name.
        date - the date on which stocks need to be sold.
        qty - the quantity to be sold.
        comm - the commission to be paid for this transaction.
        pName - the portfolio name on which this sell transaction is to be applied.

      • getTotalValue

        double getTotalValue​(java.lang.String pName,
                     java.lang.String date)
        method to get total value of a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        pName - the portfolio name.
        date - the date as of which total value of portfolio is needed.
